content.body: I've updated https://github.com/tc39/proposal-grouped-and-auto-accessors with initial spec text and plan to bring it back to committee in June for possible advancement. The spec text is aligned with the proposed spec text for Stage 3 Decorators, and expands upon the current `accessor` keyword form as we discussed when we added the `accessor` keyword to the Decorators proposal.

content.body: Full spec text is at https://tc39.es/proposal-grouped-and-auto-accessors. I will update the website link in the GitHub Repo as soon as a chair is able to fix my permissions in the repo.
